com.sap.cloud.sdk.s4hana.connectivity

Class CachingErpCommand<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixCommand<T>
      • com.sap.cloud.sdk.frameworks.hystrix.Command<T>
        • com.sap.cloud.sdk.frameworks.hystrix.CachingCommand<T>
          • com.sap.cloud.sdk.s4hana.connectivity.CachingErpCommand<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixExecutable<T>, com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixInvokable<T>, com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixInvokableInfo<T>, com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixObservable<T>, WithErpEndpoint

    public abstract class CachingErpCommand<T>
extends CachingCommand<T>
implements WithErpEndpoint
    Extends the CachingCommand to enable resilient execution and caching of results of S/4HANA queries. Introduces a member for the ErpEndpoint to be used inside the command.
